snippet: A new report by the TechAmerica Foundation provides a guide for federal agencies as they embark on so-called Big Data computing projects. It recommends a step-by-step evolution toward a technology and improved decision-making that "has the potential...
abstract: A new report by the TechAmerica Foundation provides a guide for federal agencies as they embark on so-called Big Data computing projects. It recommends a step-by-step evolution toward a technology and improved decision-making that "has the potential to be as profound as the development of the Internet itself."

headline.main: A Big Data Road Map for Government
